r.d: Payment_Process is a gateway-independent framework for processing credit cards, and eventually e-checks and other forms of payments as well.
r.n: * Information about the payment source is now contained in a Payment_Process_Type-derived class. * Authorize.net Processor added, by Joe Stump. * DPILink & Dummy Processors updated to use new semantics. * A Common class was added, which contains utility functionality common to all Processors.
